meanings.definition: A polygon with six sides and six angles.
meanings.sent1: I drew a colorful hexagon in my art class.
meanings.sent2: The stop sign has a red hexagon shape.
meanings.sent3: The bee flew around the hexagon flower bed in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the angles of a hexagon in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The honeycomb was a perfect hexagon pattern.

meanings.definition: A shape with six straight sides and six angles.
meanings.sent1: The playground had a large hexagon sandbox for the kids to play in.
meanings.sent2: The soccer ball is made up of many hexagon shapes.
meanings.sent3: The pizza slices were arranged in a hexagon on the table.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline looked like a giant hexagon from above.
meanings.sent5: The quilt was sewn with colorful hexagon patches.
